thread.section_title: Street Smart Transmission Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Street Smart Transmission | streetsmarttransmission.com | 2 of 15
thread.title: Adam Manley
thread.title_full: Street Smart Transmission reviewed by Adam Manley

author: Adam Manley
title: Adam Manley
text:
Transmission came in packaged fantastically, and it works like new!
I had reservations as the dealer wanted almost 5k to replace my 545RFE..
Street Smart had a great price, they drop-shipped it to my local mechanic and I was done for less that 3k. What a great company, I've been in auto parts for 20+ years and I will be passing the word along to all my friends.
